Post-Match Reflections: Dejounte Murray stated, 'No excuses. A lot of things going on. Still trying to get healthy, dealing with little things, but at the end of the day I'm not that guy that's going to come to media when we lose, 'Oh I'm hurt and dealing with this or that'. That's the cop-out way.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New Orleans Pelicans are in a losing streak with 10 consecutive losses and will now head on the road after the loss to the Los Angeles Clippers.
Others: The New Orleans Pelicans are without key players like Zion Williamson, Brandon Ingram, and Jose Alvarado due to injuries, impacting their performance.
